Together we can strengthen communities across North Dakota.

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Decisions made by the North Dakota Legislature have a deep and lasting impact on our state's people and communities. With the North Dakota Legislature now in session, itâ€™s time to tune in and prepare for the fight ahead.

Whether it's advocating for smart justice reforms, achieving full equality for the LGBTQ community, protecting the rights of immigrants in our state, or preserving the right to have an abortion, the ACLU of North Dakota takes up the toughest civil liberties issues during the legislative session. We'll focus a significant amount of attention to the legislative process in Bismarck, supporting bills that strengthen our rights guaranteed under the Constitution and working to defeat bills that threaten them.

But we can't do it alone. The single most important factor in influencing how a legislator votes on a bill has always been constituent support. In order to increase the odds of connecting with state legislators, we've compiled a toolkit and bill tracker to guide your efforts.

Our 2019 Legislative Advocacy Toolkit illustrates how to effectively talk with your legislators about issues that are important to you while our 2019 Bill Tracker details bills we are following.

If you're looking for additional ways to get involved with our work, follow us on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.

Democracy hinges on our ability to remain diligent and active participants in the legislative process. Let's get to work.

Thanks for sticking with us,

ACLU of North Dakota
